participant_1.background:
I got really sick and had to spend a week in the hospital.
My laundry schedule is based on the amount of running I do that week.
I am moving because my job at the pizza parlor is not giving me enough money.
my friends tell me that i am a neurotic hypochondriac.
i drink coffee every day.

participant_2.background:
I spent my last birthday listening to Christmas songs and thinking about my future love.
i love honey.
i am skilled in computer repair.
i love sweets.
I love to share stories about my family with my children over a McDonald's meal.

content.text: Hello there! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thank you for asking! How are you doing?
I'm doing well too, thanks! What are you up to today?
I'm just relaxing at home today. I have a busy week coming up so I'm trying to take it easy.
Oh, that's good to hear! I'm also relaxing at home today. I have to work tomorrow so I'm trying to get some rest.
That makes sense! What kind of work do you do?
I'm a computer repair technician. I love my job!
Oh, that's awesome! I'm not very good with computers, but I know they're important.
They are! They're essential for everyday life!
I love to cook, bake, and read. I also love spending time with my family and friends.
Those all sound like great hobbies! I love to cook and bake too. I'm not very good at reading, but I try!
You should keep trying! It's a great way to relax and learn new things.
I will! I'm glad we got to talk today!
Me too! Have a great day!
